Class DatasetUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Utility class for handling a dataset.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo

      • multiInstanceWrapperFormat

        public static weka.core.Instances multiInstanceWrapperFormat(weka.core.Instances[] source)
                                                      throws Exception
        Wrapper method, it modifies the Multi-Instance data by assigning the bag label to each instance of the corresponding bag and then builds a classifier based on the modified data (DONG, Lin, 2006, A Comparison of Multi-instance Learning Algorithms, University of Waikato)
        Parameters:
        source - An array of instances
        Returns:
        The dataset
        Throws:
        Exception - The exception to launch
